carregue os dados utilizando as funções:
read.csv() do pacote base do 
```{r}
# medir o tempo
start_time <- Sys.time()
getwd()
setwd("C:/Users/Shophia/Documents/me315")
flights_base <- read.csv("flights.csv.zip")

end_time <- Sys.time()
tempo_base <- end_time - start_time
print(tempo_base)

```

read_csv() do pacote readr do 
```{r}
library(readr)

start_time <- Sys.time()

flights_readr <- read_csv("flights.csv.zip")

end_time <- Sys.time()
tempo_readr <- end_time - start_time
print(tempo_readr)

```

read_csv() do pandas no 
```{python}
import pandas as pd
import time

start_time = time.time()

flights_pd = pd.read_csv("flights.csv.zip")

end_time = time.time()
tempo_pd = end_time - start_time
print("Tempo pandas:", tempo_pd, "segundos")

```
